description:
I just thought about this the other day and realized I haven’t seen this idea anywhere. What do you think? Comment below.
__
Monsters inc is a movie about monsters working in a scare factory.
__
Exactly what is #adrenochrome ? In scientific terms, it is a chemical that is produced in the human body when adrenaline [also known as epinephrine] oxidizes.
__
The elites super drug is harvested through the experience of terrifying individuals to the brink of fear/insanity
__
How is the chemical extracted? A victim is terrorized,and usually tortured, thus increasing the amount of adrenaline that is flowing through their body. 
___
They are then killed and the adrenochrome is collected with a needle and syringe from the base of the back of their neck and spinal column. Once collected, the chemical can be sold on the black market at exorbitant prices.
-
Repost: @thoughtleaderz 🎥
-
